thread.title: S. African leader told to resign, timeframe unknown

title: S. African leader told to resign, timeframe unknown
text:
S. African leader told to resign, timeframe unknown 10:10am EST - 01:58 
South Africa's ruling party says scandal-plagued President Jacob Zuma has agreed to resign in principle, but the timeframe for his exit is still being negotiated. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
South Africa's ruling party says scandal-plagued President Jacob Zuma has agreed to resign in principle, but the timeframe for his exit is still being negotiated. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2stvlCF
